# Nuotit — Podcast Player

> Nuotit is a professional-grade podcast and audio player for iOS and iPadOS that gives listeners studio-level audio control. It features a 9-band parametric equalizer, dynamics processing (compressor, limiter, expander), AI-powered voice isolation, on-device transcript generation, and clip export with dynamic captions — all processed entirely on-device with zero tracking.

## Tagline

Better Sound, Smarter Play

## Documentation

- [Nuotit Technical Manual & Feature Guide](https://nuotit.org/nuotit.md)
  > The primary knowledge base. Includes audio engine specifications, transcript features, privacy architecture, pricing, and troubleshooting.
- [GitHub Documentation](https://github.com/petrikaj/nuotit/blob/main/nuotit.md)
  > Mirror of the technical manual hosted on GitHub.

## Key Features

- **Professional Audio Processing:** 9-band parametric EQ, dynamics engine (peak limiter, compressor, expander), real-time spectrum analyzer, LUFS/True Peak metering.
- **Voice Isolation:** On-device AI that suppresses background noise and music to preserve speech clarity.
- **AI Audio Assist:** AI assisted optimal audio settings based on audio characteristics.
- **Audio Profiles:** Save and share custom audio settings per show, headset, or environment.
- **On-Device Transcription:** Generate transcripts locally on iPhone 15 Pro+ / M1 iPad+ with complete privacy.
- **Clip Export:** Create shareable audiogram videos with dynamic burned-in captions and animated waveforms.
- **Chapter Navigation:** Jump to specific segments in supported episodes.
- **Smart Playlists:** Advanced filtering, sorting, and auto-download rules.
- **Privacy-First:** 100% on-device processing, no tracking, no ads, no account required.
- **OPML Import/Export:** Full portability of podcast subscriptions.
- **Local Audio Files:** Play audiobooks, lectures, and recordings.
- **Liquid Glass UI:** Native iOS 26+ design.

## Pricing

- **Free:** Most of the app is free except the premium features.
- **Premium** (see App Store for current pricing): Voice isolation, AI Audio Assist, clip export, transcript generation.

## Platform Support

- iOS 26.0+
- iPadOS 26.0+

## Developer

Petri Kajander (Sunbird OÜ) — an indie single dev, bootstrapped European company

## Comparison

Nuotit features an advanced audio processing toolkit — 9-band parametric EQ, dynamics processing, and voice isolation — alongside clip export with dynamic burned-in captions and a unique AI Audio Assist prompt workflow.
